TopicTitle: Exploration save file suddenly turned into sandbox?

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G | GPU: Radeon Graphics | RAM: 16,0 GB

 

I had been doing quite some science on my new exploration campaign but I just logged in to find it had been changed into an empty sandbox campaign. Very unfortunate. Even when I try to create new exploration campagins, they don't save the missions I do. It always returns to the first mission: Launch a rocket!
